channel.title: Talks By Barbara W. Winder
channel.description: General Conference talks by Barbara W. Winder.

item.title: “I Love the Sisters of the Church”
item.description: This is very, very awesome. I think coming to a general conference of the Church and meeting here in the Tabernacle is such a great honor and a privilege at any time, but to have the privilege of being here in the presence of the prophet, when we kno

item.title: Striving Together: Transforming Our Beliefs into Action
item.description: President Hinckley, Elder Larsen, Brethren, Sister Kapp, Sister Young, and sisters. We have been blessed tonight by the music and the spoken word and by a rich outpouring of the Spirit. I am humbled and honored by this call to serve the Lord and you,

item.title: Draw Near unto Me through Obedience
item.description: My dear sisters here and around the world, what a joy it is to meet with you united in spirit to learn how we draw nearer to our Heavenly Father and His Son Jesus Christ.

item.title: Hope in Christ
item.description: I rejoice with you to be in the presence of our prophet and our priesthood leaders. To be with you sisters here and throughout the world, uniting our faith to learn gospel principles, is truly a privilege.

item.title: Finding Joy in Life
item.description: Sisters, we are all in stages of progression, whether we’re married or single. We have surely felt the comforting influence of the Spirit in these proceedings. Please know of my love and concern for you!

item.title: Becoming a Prepared People
item.description: “Make me an instrument of thy peace.” What meaningful words for the women of the Church!

item.title: Instruments to Accomplish His Purposes
item.description: My dear brothers and sisters, my heart is full to capacity. As we have been released in the normal rotation of assignments, we want to welcome those who have been newly called and to offer them our love and sincere support.
